title: Hold On
lyrics:
7 Contributors
Hold On Lyrics
[Verse 1]
I've waited for this for so long
Whatever you do, just hold on (Just hold on, hold on)
Turn off all the lights until dawn (Hold on)
Whatever you do, just hold on (Hold on, and)
[Chorus]
Whatever you do, hold on (Just hold on, just hold on)
Whatever you do, hold on (Just hold on, just hold on)
Whatever you do, hold on (Just hold on, just hold on)
Whatever you do, just hold on (Just hold on, just hold on) just hold on
[Post-Chorus]
Whatever you do, hold on
Whatever you do, just hold on, just hold on
Whatever you do, hold on
Whatever you do, just hold on, just hold on
[Verse 2]
I've waited for this for so long
Whatever you do, just hold on
Turn off all the lights until dawn (Just hold on, just hold on)
Whatever you do, just hold on (Hold on), just hold on
[Bridge]
Whatever you do, hold on (Just hold on, just hold on)
Whatever you do, hold on (Just hold on, just hold on)
Whatever you do, hold on (Just hold on, just hold on)
Whatever you do, just hold on (Hold on, just hold on) just hold on



[Post-Chorus]
Whatever you do, just hold on
Whatever you do, just hold on, just hold on
Whatever you do, hold on
Whatever you do, just hold on, just hold on
[Verse 3]
I've waited for this for so long (Just hold on, just hold on)
Whatever you do, just hold on (Just hold on, just hold on)
Turn off all the lights until dawn (The lights until dawn)
Whatever you do, just hold on (Just, just hold on), just hold on
[Outro]
(Whatever you do, hold on)
(Whatever you do, just hold on) Just hold on
